mapper.select: SELECT a.semi_lot semi_lot, a.prod_code prod_code, b.prod_name prod_name, a.semi_in_amt semi_in_amt, a.emp_code, a.prcs_list_code, c.emp_name emp_name, a.semi_ind semi_ind, a.semi_exd semi_exd FROM semi_in a JOIN com_prod b ON(a.prod_code = b.prod_code) LEFT JOIN com_emp c ON(a.emp_code = c.emp_code) ORDER BY a.semi_ind DESC

SELECT a.semi_lot semi_lot, a.prod_code prod_code, b.prod_name prod_name, a.semi_in_amt semi_in_amt, a.emp_code, a.prcs_list_code, c.emp_name emp_name, a.semi_ind semi_ind, a.semi_exd semi_exd FROM semi_in a JOIN com_prod b ON(a.prod_code = b.prod_code) LEFT JOIN com_emp c ON(a.emp_code = c.emp_code)
AND a.prod_code LIKE '%' || #{productCode} || '%'
AND a.semi_ind >= TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND a.semi_ind <= TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY a.semi_ind DESC
SELECT prod_code, prod_name FROM com_prod WHERE prod_kind = 'S' ORDER BY prod_code

SELECT a.prcs_list_code, a.prod_code, c.prod_name, a.test_amt, a.test_date FROM prod_quality a LEFT JOIN semi_in b ON(a.prcs_list_code = b.prcs_list_code) LEFT JOIN com_prod c ON(a.prod_code = c.prod_code) WHERE b.prcs_list_code IS NULL AND a.total_test_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY prcs_list_code
